definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Preventing genocide is a collective and individual responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 防止滅絕種族罪是集體和個人的責任。
